item.description:
SKI WHEELERS' CANOE/KAYAK WEEKEND
JULY 27-29
WEEKEND PACKAGE PRICE IS $85 PLUS LODGING Â $48.00

WHAT'S INCLUDED:

FRIDAY NIGHT- BEER, WINE AND SNACKS MEET AND GREET WELCOME PARTY

SATURDAY AND SUNDAY: MAKE YOUR OWN BREAKFAST
CANOE ( TWO PER CANOE) OR KAYAK RENTAL ( DEDUCT $25 FROM PACKAGE PRICE IF YOU ARE BRINGING YOUR OWN CANOE OR KAYAK)
PICNIC LUNCH ON THE SACO RIVER
SATURDAY NIGHT; LOBSTER, CHICKEN, OR STEAK DINNER WITH CORN ON THE COB, BAKED POTATO AND DESERT (BYOB)

WHAT TO BRING:
A SMALL COOLER
A FLEECE SWETER OR JACKET ( IT CAN GET COOL AND WINDY ON THE RIVER)
FOUL WEATHER GEAR ( WE GO EVEN IF IT RAINS)
A DRY BAG OR LARGE ZIP-LOCK BAG TO KEEP THINGS DRY
AN ARSENAL OF WATER-EJECTING WEAPONRY ( PEASE NO WATER BALLOONS)
INSECT REPELLENT AND SUNSCREEN
BEACH TOWEL, BATHING SUIT, WATER SHOES/SANDALS OR OLD SNEAKERS
A SLEEPING BAG, OR LINENS AND BLANKETS, PILLOW, BATH TOWEL AND TOILETRIES
YOUR SENSE OF ADVENTURE, A WILLINGNESS TO HELP OUT AND YOUR SENSE OF HUMOR

FOR MEMBERS AND GUESTS BRINGING YOUR OWN CANOE OR KAYAK SACO CANOE RENTAL OFFERS A SHUTTLE SERVICE TO PUT IN LOCATION ALONG WITH CONVENIENT PARKING AT THE TAKE OUT AT A COST OF $15- PER CANOE AND $10 FOR KAYAK.. PLEASE INDICATE ON YOUR RESERVATION FORM IF YOU WILL BE USING THEIR SERVICE.

I HAVE THE GUEST RESERVATION FORM IF YOU ARE INTERESTED.
I WILL BE ATTENDING AND LEAVING ON FRIDAY NIGHT AROUND 5. PLEASE LET ME KNOW SO THAT I CAN SEND YOU THE FORM TO FILL OUT. DEAD LINE IS JULY 13TH CHECKS MADE OUT TO WAYNE POTTER MAIL TO: 3 ANGUS AVE
LONDONDERRY, NH 03053

LET US GO AND HAVE SOME FUN.... I HAVE ATTENDED ALMOST EVERY YEAR AND I CAN TELL YOU ITS ALOT OF FUN.... A GREAT PEOPLE TO MEET..

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: SKI WHEELERS' CANOE/KAYAK WEEKEND
